group.label: Slider 1
group.comment:
In this tab you can configure additional banners displayed at the side of the main slideshow on the home page.
These settings are applied only to the main slideshow on the home page.

field.label: Slider Category
field.comment: Leave empty to use simple horizontal scrolling animation.

field.label: First Row
field.comment:
Identifier of a single static block which contains additional banners for the slideshow. Banners will be displayed at the side of the slideshow. You can use the default static block: sample_slideshow_additional_banners_1
The content of that static block will be added only to the main slideshow on the home page.
Important: Leave this field empty if you don't want to add side banners to the main slideshow on the home page.
